content: you guys really did a smooth job its clean as well as beautiful. really needed something like as the numbers of chats and groups were increasing and there was no way to control or arrange the chats but you guys saved the day. Thank You ❤
This is a lovely and gamechanger for those who are using normal whatsapp.....thankyou  @jocelin.ho for making this software
This is exactly what i wanted but the mobile app was lacking these useful features .Really Hats Off to you and thank you for making this extension for chat separator.

The extension has been really helpful in managing the WhatsApp chats and as a result also plays a great role in increasing productivity throughout the day, with making it possible to focus on directly what is required be it work, family and freinds. Kudos to the team, the product is built perfectly and the UX is also hassle-free ✨

Love it! 
1. Got rid of the native Whatsapp app on my Mac by saving Whatsapp now as a Chrome app
2. My life is now so much more organised. Thanks Cooby!!
This is something that WhatsApp should have kept by default. Thank you for the clean and organised tab-menu!
loved the Extension Recommended by https://www.youtube.com/c/JayKapoor24 and it is really worth installing!!
This is a gamechanger. productivity with Whatsapp just went up 10x !
Sky rocketing the efficiency from 10 to 80%!!
